title: Allow custom pad sizes for 0603

body:
## Summary
- support extra parameters on bare size strings
- add a regression test for `0603_pw1.0_ph1.1`
- clarify how numeric strings like `0603` are automatically prefixed with `res`
- remove an outdated comment line

## Testing
- `bun test tests/0603_padsize.test.ts --update-snapshots`
- `bun test`

title: Add elbow routing for schematic traces
description: Adds elbow routing functionality for schematic traces, allowing for more flexible routing before falling back to autorouter when obstacles are encountered.
body:
## Summary
- integrate `calculate-elbow`
- attempt elbow routing before autorouter for schematic traces
- fall back to autorouter when elbow path hits obstacles
- update snapshots

## Testing

title: Add segment-rect intersection and cleanup lockfile
description: Adds a new helper function to check for segment-rectangle intersections and cleans up the lockfile by removing the bun.lockb file and adding a bunfig.toml to disable lockfile saving.
body:
## Summary
- merge `main` into work branch
- add Bun `bunfig.toml` to disable lockfile
- remove `bun.lockb`
- keep latest dependencies with `bun update --latest`
- maintain new segment-rectangle intersection helper and tests

## Testing
- `bun test tests/segment-rect.test.ts`
- `bun test tests/line-intersections.test.ts`
- `bun test tests/segment-distance.test.ts`
- `bun run format` *(fails: Script not found)*
